channel.title: academic writing on Austin Herrick
channel.description: Recent content in academic writing on Austin Herrick

item.title: Publications
item.description: Below are publications I authored, coauthored, or to which I contributed key research. Research contributions are noted in their own section. Published or Working Papers Berkovich, Costa, Herrick, (2022) “Immigration and the Macroeconomy”. PWBM Working Paper Series. Available here Churchill, Biderman, Herrick, (2020) “Magic: The Gathering is Turing Complete”. The Proceedings of the 10th International Conference on Fun with Algorithms. Available here Penn Wharton Budget Model, Briefs
